channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nicole Kidman Files for Divorce From Keith Urban After Nearly 20 Years
item.description: The couple married in Australia in 2006. Their breakup surprised many fans.

item.title: Release of Democrat’s Naval Record Scrambles a Tight Governor’s Race
item.description: In the New Jersey governor’s race, Mikie Sherrill, the Democrat, is locked in a bitter battle with Jack Ciattarelli, the Republican, over the release ...

item.title: Earthquake in Philippines Kills at Least 20, Officials Say
item.description: The 6.9-magnitude earthquake shook the province of Cebu, home to 3.2 million people, just before 10 p.m. local time.

item.title: Recruiters caution against using AI to write job postings because it’s been trained on ‘crappy’ descriptions
item.description: Using AI might be a time-saver, but it also robs the company of the ability to think deeply about what a job requires.

item.title: U.N. Security Council Approves Larger Force to Fight Gangs in Haiti
item.description: The vote on Tuesday would establish a force of up to 5,500 soldiers and police officers. It was unclear what countries were willing to contribute pers...

item.title: Single mother sues — and beats — Kentucky for kicking her off food stamps because she bought food at the store where she worked
item.description: Franklin County Judge Thomas Wingate said it was "draconian" without "clear and convincing evidence that intentional trafficking was occurring."

item.title: Trump Says a Deal Is Close With Harvard
item.description: The agreement, if finalized, would follow months of grappling over federal dollars as the Trump administration pressured the university in its broader...

item.title: Trump says U.S. cities should be ‘training grounds’ for the military to fight an ‘invasion from within’ during unusual speech to generals
item.description: The military leaders sat mostly stone-faced through Trump’s politicized remarks.

item.title: The ‘Warren Buffett Indicator’ has surged above 200%, meaning the market’s price is far ahead of the economy’s size
item.description: Buffett has likened investing in this environment to "playing with fire."

item.title: ‘Mega bankruptcies’ are the highest they’ve been since the pandemic began, up 33% since last year alone
item.description: Continued inflation, high interest rates, falling consumer demand, tariffs, and uncertain policy shifts are driving the increase in bankruptcies.

item.title: Map: 6.9-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near the Philippines
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Earthquake in Philippines Kills at Least 20, Officials Say
item.description: The 6.9-magnitude earthquake shook the province of Cebu, home to 3.2 million people, just before 10 p.m. local time.

item.description: The couple married in Australia in 2006. Their breakup surprised many fans.

item.title: The Activists and the Anime
item.description: We take a closer look at Gen Z protests raging against the political establishment, from Nepal to Madagascar.
